name: places/ChIJwXO8-btYwokRcyadry2P4qc
adrFormatAddress: 2652 Broadway, New York, NY 10025, USA

editorialSummary.text: Source of ready-made & custom hardwood furniture, with or without finishes, for the home or office.

originalText.text: This was such a great experience. Aris was so helpful as I was looking to get a very nice closer to assist with my storage needs. He made time to do detailed measurements, drawings, and it came out lovely. I now have a beautiful closet installed in my home. He even made it possible to fit around my already existing dresser (which I painted to match). I asked to receive it before Xmas and it came within great timing. I can’t wait to invite everyone over to see this masterpiece. I highly recommend Gothic Cabinet on Broadway in Manhattan if you want to add custom made furniture to your home.

originalText.text: Perfect experience commissioning built in book shelves and radiator covers from Gothic. Thanks to Tony Stakis for his guidance and an excellent on site / install team. Top score for guidance, workmanship, value, time and install experience.

text.text: Perfect experience commissioning built in book shelves and radiator covers from Gothic. Thanks to Tony Stakis for his guidance and an excellent on site / install team. Top score for guidance, workmanship, value, time and install experience.

originalText.text: Tony and his team were so helpful installing our Murphy bed over a year ago. He helped us choose the right design for our space and we just love it! Tony recently came over on very short notice to help us with a minor issue and left us with the tools and knowledge to fix it if it happened again in the future. I highly recommend Tony’s team, their quality of work and service has been exceptional!

I highly recommend Tony’s team, their quality of work and service has been exceptional!

originalText.text: Five star experience working with Aris and the team at Gothic! We worked together on a GORGEOUS custom bar and I am so excited about it, they nailed the color, finishings, and construction. The installation was meticulous and they ensured the unit fit exactly to my prewar UWS apartment, slanted walls, uneven floors and all. I cannot reccomend the Gothic team enough for manhattan built-ins, they are the people for the job

originalText.text:
I absolutely Love this place! Not gonna lie Folks, Custom work is not inexpensive, But Baby!!!! One gets what one pays for, and the talent, work and care these EXTRAORDINARY Craftsmen and women put into their work is Beyond Compare!  I could not be happier with the things I had made!.  The workmanship is impeccable! You won't see this quality from your local discount or hardware store with a kit, nor will you find it at Ikea. I'd say I'm only kicking myself because I should have gone with my original, larger design. I can't get over their flawless execution!

When you go there, Ask for Tony! He has a Wicked Sense of Humor. He is Personable, Professional, Compassionate and Gregarious person.
Tony is a man of his word and the kind of person it is a Joy to do business with!! There are no High-Pressure Sales tactics. He shoots absolutely straight so you know EXACTLY where you stand!

TL;DR

Tony Is an incredibly Salesman. Gothic Cabinet Craft Makes beautiful, High Quality Furniture, that you won't find anywhere else. And it is VERY MUCH worth The price you pay.

I'll add some pictures when I het a chance
